name: 3D Shooter (Emin28)
description:
This is my 3D Shooter project I made while completing Game Design and Development 3: 3D Shooter.

You can use W, A, S, D to move and Space button to jump. Use mouse wheel to switch weapons.

Modifications:

1) Changed level 1 so it becomes more challenging and interesting to explore.

2) Created Boss fight level
